assetsPrompt:
# Assets Recommendations for website-vitrine (modern aesthetic)

## Image Sources
- Unsplash
- Pexels
- Pixabay

## Icon Libraries
- Feather Icons
- Heroicons
- Lucide

## Font Families
- Inter
- Roboto
- SF Pro

## Specific Assets Needed

### Hero Images
- hero-modern-business.jpg
- hero-clean-office.jpg
- hero-minimal-design.jpg

### Gallery Images
- gallery-modern-1.jpg
- gallery-modern-2.jpg
- gallery-modern-3.jpg

### Background Images
- bg-gradient-blue.jpg
- bg-pattern-dots.jpg
- bg-geometric.jpg

### Illustrations
- illustration-modern.svg
- illustration-business.svg

### Icons
- Navigation: menu.svg, close.svg, arrow-right.svg
- Actions: play.svg, download.svg, share.svg
- Social: facebook.svg, twitter.svg, linkedin.svg
- Features: feature-1.svg, feature-2.svg, feature-3.svg

### Fonts
- Headings: Inter, Roboto, SF Pro Display
- Body: Inter, Roboto, SF Pro Text
- Accent: Inter, Roboto

## Color Scheme
Use the mono-blue color palette for consistent theming.

## Implementation Notes
- Ensure all images are optimized for web (WebP format preferred)
- Use SVG icons for scalability
- Implement lazy loading for gallery images
- Consider dark/light mode variations
- Ensure accessibility compliance for all assets
